body: It's normal specially if Radiance parameters are set low. Search Grasshopper for "Stochastic Radiance" and you will find [similar discussions](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/page/search-results?cx=007664031582976519548%3A0mtws3t01h4&cof=FORID%3A10&ie=UTF-8&q=Stochastic+radiance&sa=Search&siteurl=www.grasshopper3d.com%2F&ref=www.grasshopper3d.com%2Fgroup%2Fladybug%2Fforum%2Ftopic%2Fshow%3Fid%3D2985220%253ATopic%253A1418152%26xg_source%3Dmsg&ss=4922j3167922j15).
